languages.text: "Ходят слухи, что клан бригадиров, руководящий разбором завалов на руинах Сципионы, поддерживает с ними связь. Через них мы могли бы передать отступникам ваше слово... или заставить их выдать кочевые стойбища мятежников".

"Rumour has it that the foreman clan in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione associates with these Vandals. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the foremen... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps."
languages.original_text: "Ходят слухи, что клан бригадиров, руководящий разбором завалов на руинах Сципионы, поддерживает с ними связь. Через них мы могли бы передать отступникам ваше слово... или заставить их выдать кочевые стойбища мятежников".

traits.locale_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan that is in charge of the debris clean up in the ruins of Scipione are keeping in touch with them. We could give the renegades your word via them... or get them to disclose the rebels' nomadic camps".

"Rumour has it that the brigadier clan that is in charge of the debris clean up in the ruins of Scipione are keeping in touch with them. We could give the renegades your word via them... or get them to disclose the rebels' nomadic camps".

"Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps".

"Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps".

"Rumour has it that the foreman clan in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione associates with these Vandals. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the foremen... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps."

languages.text: “有传言说，负责清理希皮奥内废墟的警督氏族一直和这些人保持联系。我们可以通过警督，把您的话转达给那群叛徒……或者强迫警督透露那些叛徒移动营地的位置。”
languages.original_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps."

traits.locale_text: “有传言说，负责清理希皮奥内废墟的警督氏族一直和这些人保持联系。我们可以通过警督，把您的话转达给那群叛徒……或者强迫警督透露那些叛徒移动营地的位置。”

languages.text: «Se rumorea que el clan de los brigadistas, a cargo de la retirada de escombros en las ruinas de Escipión, está en contacto. Podríamos transmitir sus palabras a los renegados a través de los brigadistas... u obligarles a revelar la localización de los campamentos nómadas de los rebeldes».
languages.original_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps".

traits.locale_text: «Se rumorea que el clan de los brigadistas, a cargo de la retirada de escombros en las ruinas de Escipión, está en contacto. Podríamos transmitir sus palabras a los renegados a través de los brigadistas... u obligarles a revelar la localización de los campamentos nómadas de los rebeldes».

languages.text: 「噂によると、サイピオーネの廃墟の瓦礫を撤去している准将一族が連絡を取り合っているそうです。あなたの言葉を、准将を通じて反乱軍に伝えることができますよ...もしくは、反乱軍の遊牧キャンプの場所を明かすよう、強制することもできるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps".

traits.locale_text: 「噂によると、サイピオーネの廃墟の瓦礫を撤去している准将一族が連絡を取り合っているそうです。あなたの言葉を、准将を通じて反乱軍に伝えることができますよ...もしくは、反乱軍の遊牧キャンプの場所を明かすよう、強制することもできるだろう」

languages.text: « À en croire la rumeur, le clan des Brigadiers chargé du ramassage des gravats dans les ruines de Scipione serait en contact avec eux. Nous pourrions les utiliser pour transmettre un message aux renégats ou les obliger à révéler l'emplacement des camps rebelles. »
languages.original_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps."

traits.locale_text: « À en croire la rumeur, le clan des Brigadiers chargé du ramassage des gravats dans les ruines de Scipione serait en contact avec eux. Nous pourrions les utiliser pour transmettre un message aux renégats ou les obliger à révéler l'emplacement des camps rebelles. »

languages.text: "Gerüchten zufolge steht der Brigadierclan, der für die Beseitigung des Schutts in den Ruinen von Scipion verantwortlich ist, noch in Kontakt mit ihnen. Die Brigadiere könnten Eure Worte an die Abtrünnigen weitergeben ... Oder wir könnten sie zwingen, uns die Koordinaten der Nomadenlager der Ketzer zu nennen."
languages.original_text: "Rumour has it that the brigadier clan, in charge of debris removal in the ruins of Scipione, keep in contact. We could pass on your words to the renegades via the brigadiers... or force them to disclose the locations of the rebels' nomadic camps."

traits.locale_text: "Gerüchten zufolge steht der Brigadierclan, der für die Beseitigung des Schutts in den Ruinen von Scipion verantwortlich ist, noch in Kontakt mit ihnen. Die Brigadiere könnten Eure Worte an die Abtrünnigen weitergeben ... Oder wir könnten sie zwingen, uns die Koordinaten der Nomadenlager der Ketzer zu nennen."
